name: Rise: The Vieneo Province
storyline:
The premise is hard to explain… you start out in the capital city of Deois in federal housing' You have a ground vehicle in an underground garage in the same complex' That is about where their experience will diverge from everyone else’s and from any other MMOPG we have seen'

You could make a life as a taxi driver in the city and never leave the transit district' But why do that when there are no boundaries? Sure, if you took off driving to the east of the city, you will eventually hit the Ederas Sea' But if you go southwest, you can drive until you run out of gas' But if you had enough gas, you could keep driving that direction and end up driving all the way around the planet to end up in Deois again (after about 18,500 km)'

So maybe you are an explorer, a ground vehicle isn’t going to cut it so you build your finances to purchase an aircraft like our A-4 Wanderer model' Sleek and fast, economical fuel burn, but only holds one cargo container and a handful of passengers' Maybe your dream is to build an empire far removed from the capital city' You can purchase property from the government or each other to build mining colonies, farming communities, and even your own townships'

What if you dream to fly in space? A majority of our players share this aspiration' The model E-10 Saint is your bird' But the steep price tag and difficult reentry might make you consider taking a day off as a taxicab driver and taking a ride aboard another player’s ship!
summary: Rise is a persistent science fiction sandbox strategy MMO set on Vieneo, a moon orbiting an exoplanet. Use ground, air, and space vehicles to explore this vast open world of 100 million square kilometers in size! You are helping establish a living, breathing world with virtually no boundaries!
